resources.string: Click here to get more Infos about Switzerland!
Click here to listen to Swiss Radiostations!
Welcome to the Infos about Switzerland!
Here you will find interesting facts and informations about Switzerland.
Switzerland is known for its beautiful landscapes, including the Alps and numerous lakes.
The country is famous for its chocolate, cheese, and watches.
Switzerland has four official languages: German, French, Italian, and Romansh.
The capital city of Switzerland is Bern, while Zurich is the largest city. When Napoleon was in Switzerland he chose Aarau as his headquarters.
Bern is not only the capital city its the city where the Swiss Parliament is located.
Switzerland is known for its high quality of life and consistently ranks among the top countries in the world for healthcare, education, and overall well-being.
Switzerland is known for its neutrality and has not been involved in any military conflict since 1815.
The Swiss banking system is renowned for its stability and privacy.
Switzerland is home to many international organizations, including the Red Cross and the United Nations office in Geneva.
